name: Parallel Self
description:
A game where you try to rejoin parallel dimensions. To do so eliminate your parallel selfs or synchronize with them. Depending on your actions your parallel selfs will change their behavior. The game was made for the GMTK gamejam 2021.

Control with WASD and mouse.  

Made by Moepeldimoep and PitBull. This was our first gamejam.
Please leave your feedback in the comments.
